name: Stacie Jackson
text: The pizza is always hot when we pick it up. They do a great job on the topping. Friendly service.

name: Amy Tilghman
text: Needed a quick lunch and great service. Personal pizza was just right. Be back again when in town.

name: Jack Carpenter
text: Great friendly staff! I love their personal pan pizzas. The crust is perfect!

name: lynn phares
text: Good sandwich, good price

name: Stephanie Curl
text: We always love going to this place best pizza and salads

name: Mikel Johnson
text: Had the chicken bacon ranch sub and it was amazing!!

name: Donna Gentry
text: Ordered the large, thin crust, specialty pizza: chicken bacon ranch. It was great!

name: Ray Tate
text: Talk about a friendly place. My first time in there and I felt right at home. Ordered a large Canadian bacon pizza and was delighted at how good it was. As good as any if the franchise places. I'll be here more often.

name: CJ
text: Love this place. Fast and friendly service and the food great too.

name: Mirriah Ramsey
text: Great service and good pizza!

name: Karlie Murphy
text: They have the BEST pizza. And it's definitely the sweetest ladies that run it! Prices are awesome too.

name: T Reyes
text: Great pizza, friendly staff, reasonable price.

name: JayBoog
text: Great pizza and salads for a reasonable price.

name: Robert Hayes
text: Great pizza

name: Tom n Leah
text: Great little small town pizza place.

name: Kevin
text: Good place to enjoy time with family and friends!

name: John Fulmer
text: In a place with brutal pizza competitors, the Triple P's pizza is top Dog in pangburn! â€¦More

name: Caleb Bowling
text: Great pizza and wonderful service.

name: Weslie Haile
text: Amazing staff! Super quick and they deliver!!

name: Jamie Greene
text: Wonderful people great pizza great sandwiches.
